item.title: Mask Usage Conspiracy Theories
item.description: Note: I am not a medical professional and I have no background in medical science; please consult public health agencies like the CDC or WHO for actual medical information. This post was just written for a co-worker. Introduction Recently, I had a discussion with a co-worker who told me that there was a lot of misinformation going around about mask usage and that he believed that masks were ineffective– or at least not as effective as public health agencies claim.
